channel.title: VERY unusual problem
channel.description:
Hey guys! Im using the Matrix client. I have a weird and unusual problem, if I use java 7 if I want to play Runescape, RSPS, webclient or a downloaded client, I lag or freeze within 20 seconds of the game, then im kicked out. I see Matrix has returned, and they released a client run named "Play Matrix Java 6 x64". I played this and I didn't lagg, freeze or get kicked out at all. I know that when I use Java 6 this never happens, but if I use java 7 this always happens.
Does anybody know how to fix this? Or does anybody know how to make a java 6 client - run?
Thanks guys :)

item.title: VERY unusual problem
item.dc:creator: @deathbysniper97 deathbysniper97
item.description:
@deathbysniper97 wrote:

change jre7 to jre6 in the .bat files
It probably wont work, seeing as when you have jre7, it removes the jre6 files.
Thats just what i think, i hope you figure it out.

Read full topic

@Sup22211 wrote:

Im using the Matrix client.
I have a weird and unusual problem, if I use java 7 if I want to play Runescape, RSPS, webclient or a downloaded client, I lag or freeze within 20 seconds of the game, then im kicked out.
